casebody.data:
Cole, Respondent, v. New York El. R. Co. et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. June 1, 1891.) Appeal from jury term. Action by William L. Cole against the New York Elevated Railroad Company and another. From judgment entered on findings, etc., at special term, defendants appeal.

Argued before Sedgwick, C. J„ and Freedman and McAdam, JJ.

Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Peekham & Tyler, (Henry G. Atwater, of counsel,) for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
